name: Supplier Identification & Vetting
text: Global network of pre-qualified vendors, rigorous due diligence (financial stability, compliance, ESG alignment).

name: Contract Lifecycle Management
text: Custom contracts with favorable terms (SLAs, penalties, exit clauses) with strict Adherence to local/international regulations (FAR, UCC, ISO 20400).

name: Tailored Procurement Solutions
text: Direct Procurement- Tailored solutions for direct procurement, including sourcing, negotiation, and supplier management & Indirect Procurement including MRO supplies, IT services, and facilities management.

name: Technology-Driven Efficiency
text: AI-powered spend analytics, e-procurement platforms, and PO automation.
